tweet: It's finally out. The #IOTA foundation has a specific solution for the coordicide. The centralization in IOTA will be gone pretty soon. Which then (if everything works as intended) makes IOTA the only and first project that fulfills Satoshis vision, but without mining, in 2019.
#IOTA it's not an #altcoin. Altcoins are #Bitcoin variations. IOTA it's #cryptocurrency 2.0.
PoW: miner = owner PoS: holder = owner #IOTA: user = owner
